bibl.title: Thysdrus, the Troad, Sagalassos and Gortyn.
bibl.note: Presents a bronze lamp with a Greek inscription: YUSdROU. British Museum, Reg. No. GR 1926.4-15.42. Acquired in Alexandria, second or third century AD. References to cities or areas outside Egypt are found also on Egyptian pottery lamps: Athribis, Polish Excavations, Exc. No. 86/148; British Museum, Reg. No. GR 1987.4-2.1; Kom el-Dikka, Polish Excavations, Exc. No. SU 3801/82; S.B. V, 7836. <Thusdrou>
BAILEY Donald M., Thysdrus, the Troad, Sagalassos and Gortyn.
